statements.query: MATCH (n:Certificate)<-[:HAS_CERTIFICATE]-(:Stage)<-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]-(:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:Certificate)<-[r:HAS_CERTIFICATE]-(:Stage)<-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]-(:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (n:MethodSettings)-[:METHOD_SETTINGS_OF]->(:Stage)<-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]-(:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:MethodSettings)-[r:METHOD_SETTINGS_OF]->(:Stage)<-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]-(:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (n:Stage)<-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]-(:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:Stage)<-[r:ASSOCIATED_WITH]-(:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (n:Resource)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:Resource)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (n:RestAPI)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:RestAPI)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
